name: Biztech Consultancy
tag_list: professional-web-development-company, web-development-company-india, website-designing, website-development-company-india, ecommerce-development-company, offshore-outsourcing-company, php-development-company, magento-development, cakephp-development, suga
overview:
Biztech Consultancy is an India based professional website design and website development company. We are offshore web services provider offering web solutions at an affordable rates for Web applications development, website designing, web site maintenance, full-featured online shopping stores, Software development, ecommerce solutions, portal development, Facebook application development, web directory development to global businesses of all sizes.

As a offshore Web Development Company our varied web applications are built using the latest cutting-edge technologies like php, cakephp, Ajax, jqury, python, magento, sugar CRM, net office and will be customized totally to the needs of your enterprise. With clients globally, we produce innovative, high-performance Websites for companies in multiple industries including hospitality, retail, wholesale, communications and so on. Using the latest programming and design technologies, At Biztech Consultancy, we create the optimal, effective online as well as desktop experience for every client. We take pride in our on time delivery and ability to meet quick turn around requests while exceeding customer quality demands.
